name: criticlist.ca
tag_list: local-search, business, review, rate, ratings, reviews, canada, critic, critics, online-business-review
overview:
Finally, a place where internet users can openly give opinions about their favorite and least favorite businesses. Whether you were pleased with your experience or are dissatisfied with the services, we want to hear about it.

CriticList.ca is the place to praise, vent, inform, and learn about any and all businesses around you. What better judge of quality is there than the court of public opinion? Read what people have to say in the user generated business reviews.

Read descriptions of businesses without having to visit them first. Find out about their products before you make the buy. All the information you need is right here and is provided by the most reliable source…..YOU!
